DOC.brief_summary: This study aim investigate efficacy two different intravenous drug ( dimenhydrinate piracetam ) symptomatic management peripheral vertigo . The patient randomize two group accord symptomatic treatment modality : Dimenhydrinate ( 100 mg ) piracetam ( 2 g ) give 100 cc normal saline 30 minute . Each patient ask her/his vertigo symptom resolve , accord numeric rating scale ( 0=no vertigo , 10=worst possible vertigo ) . The patient rate intensity symptom follow time : - Numeric rating scale ( 1 10 ) : Admission - Numeric rating scale ( 1 10 ) : After study drug ( No ambulation ) * - Numeric rating scale ( 1 10 ) : After study drug ( Ambulation ) * - Ambulation refers head movement walk room , applicable .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Efficacy Between Piracetam Dimenhydrinate Patients With Peripheral Vertigo
DOC.criteria: Presenting emergency department vertigo symptom Adult patient ( 18 ) Agree participate study ( understand study protocol signing informed consent form ) Patients 18 year Patients diagnose ischemic/hemorrhagic stroke neuroimaging Patient diagnose transient ischemic attack Pregnants Patients take analgesic antihistaminic drug last 24 hour Documented declare allergy dimenhydrinate , piracetam benzodiazepine Patients agree participate study
